label: valueAmount
comment: A value, expressed as a monetary value, for this document characteristic.
The monetary value for this metric characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this agricultural characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this organization characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this process characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this product batch characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this product characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this sustainability characteristic.
The value, expressed as an amount, for this technical characteristic.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an agricultural object.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a document.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
A prominent attribute or aspect of an organization.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
